name: 👽 A Game about Cows 2: No Respite 🐮🛸
name_original: 👽 A Game about Cows 2: No Respite 🐮🛸
description:
Objective:

  • Rescue at least 3 of each animal back to their pens where they will be safe.
  • Do not get yourself caught by a UFO, as otherwise you will be abducted too.
  • Use your egg-o-matic-2022 egg action rifle launcher™️ to launch a counterattack against the UFOs. This will distract them and cause them to drop whatever they have abducted, 4 hits are enough to destroy them.

Controls:

  • Left click to shoot and pick up animals
  • Right click to zoom, scroll to adjust zoom level
  • WASD to move, space to jump
  • Shift to sprint
  • Esc to pause
  • R to restart
